name: Arengesus
domains: God of Randomness and pure Chaos
worshippers:
Gamblers and the desperate

He has no clergy as he is not largely worshipped, which is not to say that he couldn't, just that he doesn't.
appearance: Arengesus appearance is always random when he appears to his followers.  One day he could appear as a small child, and the next day as a talking sandwich.  His true form, if one exists, is known only to his most loyal followers.
tenets: Your life is more fulfilling and entertaining when you throw off the boundaries of the normal schema of the world and behave in a manner that is random and unpredictable.
parents: Migrated from another multiverse, taking over the domain of the long deceased Tychaios, who was 3rd generation, born of Area and Fanome.
